title: CNN Dishonestly 'Fact-Checks' the RNC | Elijah Schaffer Live from Kenosha | Good Morning #MugClub
description: Steven reviews the media's "fact-checking" of the RNC, much of which is dishonest itself, and then interviews Elijah Schaffer of Blaze Media, who is on the scene in Kenosha, Wisconsin, reporting on the riots.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
